Component.name: BasicInformation
Component.clariah:label: Level 1: Basic Information
Component.clariah:explanation: Basic Information on Data-Envelope

Element.name: title
Element.clariah:label: 1.1. Title of Data-Envelope
Element.clariah:explanation: Follow the format: Dataset Name Version-X Data-Envelope Version-Y

Component.name: ContactDetails
Component.clariah:label: 1.2. Contact Details
Component.clariah:explanation: Provide contact information for the project.

Element.name: name
Element.clariah:label: Name
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the full name.

Component.name: authorDataEnvelope
Component.clariah:label: 1.4 Author of Data-Envelope
Component.clariah:explanation: Provide information on the author of the data-envelope.

Element.name: name
Element.clariah:label: Name
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide their full name.

Element.name: feedbackSectionOne
Element.clariah:label: Feedback
Element.clariah:explanation: Please use this space to provide any feedback on this section and to share any other insights or information you think would be useful for this level.

Element.name: description
Element.clariah:label: Description
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a free text account of the dataset or resource (limit 200 words). Include information about the content and topic of the data, sources and motivations for dataset creation.

Element.name: genre
Element.clariah:label: Genre
Element.clariah:explanation: Choose one or more of the following genres that apply to the dataset/resources:

Element.name: genreOther
Element.clariah:label: Other Genre
Element.clariah:explanation: Specify the particular genre of the dataset if not included in the dropdown list above.

Element.name: topic
Element.clariah:label: Topic Classification
Element.clariah:explanation: Choose one or more of the following topics (from NWO research list) that apply to the dataset/resource:

Element.name: topicOther
Element.clariah:label: Other Topic
Element.clariah:explanation: Specify topic(s) of the dataset if not included in the dropdown list above.

Element.name: languages
Element.clariah:label: Languages
Element.clariah:explanation: This refers to the natural language used for textual metadata (i.e., titles, descriptions, etc.) of a cataloged resource (i.e., dataset or service) or the textual values of a dataset distribution. Choose one or more of the following languages (from ISO 639-2) of the dataset/resource:

Element.name: GeographicalCoverage
Element.clariah:label: Geographical Coverage
Element.clariah:explanation: This refers to the geographical area pertaining to the datasets. Choose one or more of the following geographies that apply to the dataset/resource:

Element.name: yearFrom
Element.clariah:label: Temporal Coverage Start Date
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide start year of temporal scope of the dataset

Element.name: yearTo
Element.clariah:label: Temporal Coverage End Date
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide end date of temporal scope of the dataset

Element.name: year
Element.clariah:label: Year
Element.clariah:explanation: In case temporal scope cannot be captured in a range, add relevant years

Element.name: additionalNotes
Element.clariah:label: Additional Notes
Element.clariah:explanation: Use this box to specify any additional information about temporal scope of the dataset.

Element.name: datasetPublicationDate
Element.clariah:label: Dataset Publication Date
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the dataset publication date.

Component.name: CreatorsContributors
Component.clariah:label: 2.3 Creators and Contributors
Component.clariah:explanation: Specify the individuals or organizations that created, contributed to, and are sharing the dataset. This information is essential in identifying the dataset's provenance.

Component.name: publishingOrganisation
Component.clariah:label: Publishing Organisation
Component.clariah:explanation: Provide information for each publishing organisation

Element.name: Name
Element.clariah:label: Name
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the name of the publishing organisation

Element.name: ROR
Element.clariah:label: ROR ID
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the Research Organisation Registry (ROR) ID for the publishing organisation

Element.name: type
Element.clariah:label: Type
Element.clariah:explanation: Choose the type of publishing organisation

Element.name: other
Element.clariah:label: Other
Element.clariah:explanation: If type of publishing organisation chosen as "Other", please specify here

Component.name: Creators
Component.clariah:label: Creators
Component.clariah:explanation: Provide the following information for each creator of the dataset.

Element.name: ROR
Element.clariah:label: ROR ID
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the Research Organisation Registry (ROR) ID for the affiliated organisation

Element.name: Role
Element.clariah:label: Role
Element.clariah:explanation: Specify the role in the project

Element.name: email
Element.clariah:label: Email
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the insitutional email of contributor

Component.name: funding
Component.clariah:label: Funding Source
Component.clariah:explanation: Provide information on each funding organisation

Element.name: name
Element.clariah:label: Name
Element.clariah:explanation: Name of organisation

Element.name: summary
Element.clariah:label: Funding or Grant Summary
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a short summary of organisation and grant that may have funded the creation, collection, or curation of the dataset.

Element.name: datasetlink
Element.clariah:label: Dataset Link
Element.clariah:explanation: For instance its DOI, Handle, or ARK

Element.name: repository
Element.clariah:label: Repository
Element.clariah:explanation: If the dataset has its own dedicated website(s) or is hosted on sites such as github, zenodo, dataverse, marketplace, provide the url(s) here:

Element.name: link
Element.clariah:label: Link
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide link where dataset can be downloaded

Element.name: filesize
Element.clariah:label: File Size
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide file size in MB

Element.name: citationInformation
Element.clariah:label: Citation Information
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide dataset citation reference

Component.name: accessLicenses
Component.clariah:label: 2.5 Licenses and Accesses
Component.clariah:explanation: Specify the license(s) and access levels under which the dataset is shared. This information is crucial in determining the appropriate re-use of datasets and access information.

Component.name: licensingInformation
Component.clariah:label: Lincensing Information
Component.clariah:explanation: For every relevant license, provide the following information:

Element.name: identifier
Element.clariah:label: Identifier
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the identifier of the license(s) used.

Component.name: access
Component.clariah:label: Access
Component.clariah:explanation: This section details access rights for the dataset, indicating if it is open to all users or restricted to authorized individuals. It also specifies whether access is available anonymously or requires registration.

Element.name: accessLevel
Element.clariah:label: Access Level
Element.clariah:explanation: Choose one of the following access levels

Component.name: accessRestricted
Component.clariah:label: Access Restricted
Component.clariah:explanation: If access is restricted, please fill in this section.

Element.name: description
Element.clariah:label: Description
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a description of the access restriction. Include an explanation of why access controls are in place. Also highlight any restrictions or limitations such as geographic restrictions, time-limited access, or requirements of fees, national regulation, etc. Also provide any prerequisites for acceptable use, such as reading data usage policy.

Element.name: url
Element.clariah:label: URL
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the link to insructions and/or page to request access.

Element.name: contactEmail
Element.clariah:label: Contact Email
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide email for users to reach out with any questions or concerns regarding data access.

Component.name: version
Component.clariah:label: Version
Component.clariah:explanation: Provide details about this version of the dataset.

Element.name: releaseDate
Element.clariah:label: Release Date
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the publication date of this version of the dataset.

Element.name: maintenanceStatus
Element.clariah:label: Maintenance Status
Element.clariah:explanation: Select one of the following:

Component.name: maintenancePlan
Component.clariah:label: Maintenance Plan
Component.clariah:explanation: Summarize the maintenance plan for the dataset:

Element.name: updates
Element.clariah:label: Updates
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide information about criteria for updating the dataset. Include information on how errors are triaged or handled, and criteria for updating the dataset.

Element.name: feedback
Element.clariah:label: Feedback
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide email/contact information for users to communicate errors in data and technical issues:

Component.name: nextUpdate
Component.clariah:label: Next Planned Update
Component.clariah:explanation: Provide details about the next planned update if known:

Element.name: feedbackSectionTwo
Element.clariah:label: Feedback and Elaboration
Element.clariah:explanation: Please use this space to provide any feedback on this section and to share any other insights or information you think would be useful for this level.

Component.name: Data
Component.clariah:label: Level 3: Data
Component.clariah:explanation: For each data resource/file in the dataset, fill in the following:

Element.name: Description
Element.clariah:label: Description
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a description of the particular resource/file:

Element.name: path
Element.clariah:label: Path
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide resource url

Element.name: format
Element.clariah:label: Format
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide file extension for resource (such as csv, json, xls):

Element.name: size
Element.clariah:label: Size
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide file size:

Element.name: date
Element.clariah:label: Date
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide date of creation:

Element.name: language
Element.clariah:label: Language(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: provide language used in the dataset:

Element.name: encoding
Element.clariah:label: Encoding
Element.clariah:explanation: Specify character encoding of the resource's data file:

Element.name: Subjects
Element.clariah:label: Subject(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Choose one or more of the following subjects of the dataset resource:

Element.name: other
Element.clariah:label: Other Data Subject(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: If "Other" was chosen, please speciify:

Element.name: modality
Element.clariah:label: Modality
Element.clariah:explanation: Choose one or more of the following modalities

Element.name: other
Element.clariah:label: Other Modalities
Element.clariah:explanation: If "Other" or "Multimodal" was chosen, please specify:

Component.name: dataFields
Component.clariah:label: 3.2 Data Fields
Component.clariah:explanation: Describe every data field in the resource.

Component.name: dataField
Component.clariah:explanation: Describe every data field in the resource:

Element.name: dataFieldName
Element.clariah:label: Data Field Name
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide label or identifier for the data field.

Element.name: dataFieldType
Element.clariah:label: Data Field Type
Element.clariah:explanation: Specify the type of data in the filed. For instance, common data types are: string, integer, boolean, date, etc.

Element.name: descriptionField
Element.clariah:label: Description of the Data Field
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a description of what the field represents, including any specific details about the data format or structure. If the field involves complex data like span indices, explain whether these indices are based on characters or words, and whether they are contiguous (continuous without breaks) or not.

Element.name: sensitivity
Element.clariah:label: Sensitivity
Element.clariah:explanation: Indicate whether the data stored in this field is sensitive. Sensitive data might include personal information that could be harmful if exposed, such as social security numbers, personal addresses, or health information.

Element.name: notableFeatures
Element.clariah:label: Notable Features
Element.clariah:explanation: List any important or unique attributes of the field that might be relevant for users or systems interacting with the data.

Component.name: usedVocabularies
Component.clariah:explanation: Provide information on linked open data schemes, controlled vocabularies, ontologies and taxonomies used during the establishment of the dataset.

Element.name: vocabulary
Element.clariah:label: Vocabulary
Element.clariah:explanation: Summarise linked open data scheme, controlled vocabulary, ontology or taxonomy used during the establishment of the dataset.

Element.name: vocabularyLink
Element.clariah:label: Vocabulary Link
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide link to the taxonomy or relevant documentation that describes it.

Element.name: description
Element.clariah:label: Description
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a description of a typical example of a data point.

Element.name: link
Element.clariah:label: Link
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a link to this data point if possible.

Element.name: atypdescription
Element.clariah:label: Description
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a description of an atypical example of a data point.

Element.name: atyplink
Element.clariah:label: Link
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a link to this data point if possible.

Component.name: errors
Component.clariah:label: 3.4 Errors, Noise, and Redundancies
Component.clariah:explanation: Are there any errors, sources of noise, or redundancies in this resource?

Element.name: errordescription
Element.clariah:label: Description
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a description of the errors, noise, and/or redundancies in this resource.

Element.name: resources
Element.clariah:label: Resources
Element.clariah:explanation: Is the dataset self-contained, or does it link to or otherwise rely on external resources (e.g., websites, other datasets)?

Element.name: extResources
Element.clariah:label: External Resources Description and Links
Element.clariah:explanation: If not, please specify what external resources (such as website, other datasets) it relies on and provide links to these resources.

Component.name: annotations
Component.clariah:label: 3.6 Annotation and Labeling
Component.clariah:explanation: Fill in this section to specify if any human or algorithmic annotation tasks were performed in the creation of your dataset resource. Repeat this section for every "annotation workforce type".

Component.name: annotationCharacteristics
Component.clariah:label: Annotation Characteristics
Component.clariah:explanation: Describe relevant characteristics of each annotation type as indicated.

Element.name: disclaimer
Element.clariah:label: Does the resource contain data that, if viewed directly, might be offensive, insulting, threatening, or might otherwise cause anxiety?

Element.name: specify
Element.clariah:label: If yes or you are not sure, please specify:

Element.name: specify
Element.clariah:label: Specify Measures
Element.clariah:explanation: If yes, specify what measures were taken to avoid disclosure of personal information.

Element.name: knownBiases
Element.clariah:label: Known Biases in the Resource
Element.clariah:explanation: Identify any known biases present in this dataset, such as stereotyping, underrepresentation, overrepresentation, or misrepresentation of certain social groups. Briefly describe the nature and, if possible, the extent of these biases to help users make informed decisions and mitigate potential harms.

Element.name: stepsToReduceBias
Element.clariah:label: Steps taken to Mitigate/Reduce Biases
Element.clariah:explanation: Describe the steps taken to reduce or mitigate biases in the dataset.

Element.name: sensitiveAttribute
Element.clariah:label: Sensitive Human Attributes
Element.clariah:explanation: Specify if the dataset contain data that might be considered sensitive in any way (e.g., data that reveals race, sexual orientation, age, ethnicity, disability status, political orientation, religious beliefs, union memberships; location; financial or health data; biometric or genetic data; criminal history).Select all attributes that are represented (directly or indirectly) in the dataset resource:

Element.name: specify
Element.clariah:label: Specify
Element.clariah:explanation: Specify the kind of sensitive attribute in the resource or elaborate further.

Element.name: unintentionalAttribute
Element.clariah:label: Unintentionally Collected Attributes
Element.clariah:explanation: Specify whether there are any human attributes were not explicitly collected as a part of the dataset creation process but can be inferred using additional methods.

Element.name: review
Element.clariah:label: Review
Element.clariah:explanation: Was an ethical review conducted in order to create this dataset?

Element.name: outcomes
Element.clariah:label: Outcomes
Element.clariah:explanation: Describe the outcomes of the ethical review, and how they influenced the dataset creation.

Element.name: name
Element.clariah:label: Name
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide name of person who may be contacted in relation to questions on ethical review.

Element.name: contact
Element.clariah:label: Email
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide their email address.

Component.name: dataProvenance
Component.clariah:label: 3.8 Data Provenance
Component.clariah:explanation: For every source used to create this resource, provide the following information:

Element.name: path
Element.clariah:label: URL
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a URL of the source if available:

Element.name: description
Element.clariah:label: Description
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a brief description of the source and why it was used?

Element.name: creatorName
Element.clariah:label: Creator Name(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide name of individual creators of the source (if known)

Element.name: creatorOrganisation
Element.clariah:label: Creator Organisation(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide name of affiliated organisations or creating organisation

Element.name: language
Element.clariah:label: Language(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the languages of the source.

Element.name: temporalScope
Element.clariah:label: Temporal Scope
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the temporal scope of the resource (if known).

Element.name: geographicalScope
Element.clariah:label: Geographical Scope
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide the geographical scope of the resource (if known).

Element.name: notableFeatures
Element.clariah:label: Notable Features
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide any notable features and known biases and issues with the source.

Element.name: datasheetEnvelope
Element.clariah:label: Datasheet/Data-Envelope
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a link to a datasheet/data-envelope on the source if available.

Element.name: digitalisationPipeline
Element.clariah:label: Digitalisation Pipeline
Element.clariah:explanation: If applicable, describe in what way digitisation presents another layer of selection of the whole of a collection available in a cultural heritage institution; state if this is not the case. If applicable, provide selection criteria and metrics that demonstrate how this additional layer of selection has influenced the transformation of the original collection or dataset into the current dataset.

Element.name: feedbackSectionThree
Element.clariah:label: Feedback and Elaboration
Element.clariah:explanation: Please use this space to provide any feedback on this section and to share any other insights or information you think would be useful for this level.

Element.name: other
Element.clariah:label: Other
Element.clariah:explanation: If "Other" was chosen above, please speciify

Element.name: domains
Element.clariah:label: Domain(s) of Application
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide list of key domains of application that dataset has been designed for.

Element.name: motivation
Element.clariah:label: Motivating Factor(s) and Problem Space(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: What motivated the creation of this dataset? What were some of the reasons underlying the major choices involved in putting it together? Provide a description of the specific problem space that this dataset intends to to address

Element.name: datasetUseSpecify
Element.clariah:label: Explain for special cases chosen above

Element.name: publications
Element.clariah:label: Publications
Element.clariah:explanation: If the dataset was introduced by a paper or there was a paper written describing the dataset, add URL here

Component.name: SuitableUseCase
Component.clariah:label: Suitable Use Case(s)
Component.clariah:explanation: Summarize known suitable and intended use cases of this dataset.

Element.name: suitableUseCase
Element.clariah:label: Suitable Use Case
Element.clariah:explanation: Summarize here. Include links where necessary.

Component.name: UnsuitableUseCase
Component.clariah:label: Unsuitable Use Case(s)
Component.clariah:explanation: Summarize known unsuitable and unintended use cases of this dataset.

Element.name: safetyLevelOther
Element.clariah:label: Other
Element.clariah:explanation: If "Other" was chosen above, please speciify

Element.name: knownSafeDatasetsDataTypes
Element.clariah:label: Known safe dataset(s) or data type(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: List the known datasets (provide link) or data types and corresponding transformations that are safe to join or aggregate this dataset with.

Element.name: KnownUnsafeDatasetsDataTypes
Element.clariah:label: Known unsafe dataset(s) or Data Type(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: List the known datasets or data types and corresponding transformations that are unsafe to join or aggregate this dataset with.

Component.name: UseInMLOrAISystems
Component.clariah:label: 4.3 Use in ML or AI Systems

Element.name: otherDatasetUses
Element.clariah:label: Other dataset use
Element.clariah:explanation: If dataset use chosen as "Other", please specify here

Element.name: notableFeatures
Element.clariah:label: Notable Feature(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Describe any notable feature distributions or relationships between individual instances made explicit.

Element.name: knownCorrelations
Element.clariah:label: Known Correlation(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Summarize any known correlations with the indicated features in this dataset.

Element.name: usageGuidelines
Element.clariah:label: Usage Guideline(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Summarize or link to usage guidelines or policies that consumers should be aware of in using this dataset for ML purposes.

Element.name: dataSplits
Element.clariah:label: Data splits
Element.clariah:explanation: Are there recommended data splits (e.g., training, development/validation, testing)? If so, please provide a description of these splits, explaining the rationale behind them.

Element.name: otherSafetyLevel
Element.clariah:label: Other
Element.clariah:explanation: If Safety Level chosen as "Other", please specify here

Element.name: acceptableSamplingMethods
Element.clariah:label: Acceptable Sampling Method(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Select all applicable acceptable methods to sample this dataset

Element.name: otherAcceptableSamplingMethods
Element.clariah:label: Other
Element.clariah:explanation: If Acceptable Sampling Method(s) chosen as "Other", please specify here

Element.name: risksAndMitigations
Element.clariah:label: Risk(s) and Mitigation(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Summarize known or residual risks associated with sampling methods when applied to the dataset.

Element.name: feedbackSectionFour
Element.clariah:label: Feedback
Element.clariah:explanation: Please use this space to provide any feedback on this section and to share any other insights or information you think would be useful for this level.

Component.name: HumanAnnotators
Component.clariah:label: 5.1. Human Annotators
Component.clariah:explanation: Fill this section if human annotators were used to create dataset/resource

Element.name: annotatorDescription
Element.clariah:label: Annotator description
Element.clariah:explanation: Provide a brief description for each annotator group performing the human annotation task

Element.name: taskType
Element.clariah:label: Task Type
Element.clariah:explanation: Summarize here. Include links if available. Ideally connect to some existing taxonomy: survey, video annotation, text annotation, image annotation, etc

Element.name: avgannotations
Element.clariah:label: Average number of Annotations per Annotator

Element.name: expertiseOfAnnotators
Element.clariah:label: Expertise of annotators
Element.clariah:explanation: For example, archival and historical knowledge and reading and understanding historical Dutch.

Element.name: compensation
Element.clariah:label: Compensation
Element.clariah:explanation: Indicate here whether they were crowdsourced or not, and if not, what compensation they received. For example, 'compensated as per the Dutch CAO'.

Element.name: geographicDistributionOfAnnotators
Element.clariah:label: Geographic distribution of annotators
Element.clariah:explanation: For example, 100% reside in the Netherlands.

Element.name: genderDistributionOfAnnotators
Element.clariah:label: Gender distribution of annotators
Element.clariah:explanation: For example, 60% identify as women, 40% as men.

Element.name: socioEconomicDistribOfAnnotators
Element.clariah:label: Socio-economic distribution of annotators
Element.clariah:explanation: For example, 40% identify as lower middle class, 60% as middle class.

Element.name: summaryOfAnnotationInstructions
Element.clariah:label: Summary of annotation instructions
Element.clariah:explanation: Summarize here. Include links if available, say to to the annotation instructions, readme.

Element.name: annotationPlatforms
Element.clariah:label: Annotation platform(s)
Element.clariah:explanation: Include link(s) if available

Element.name: additionalNotes
Element.clariah:label: Additional Notes
Element.clariah:explanation: For example: During the annotation process all annotators were trained to read and understand the original texts by the archival expert and were invited to compare the HTR texts with the scans of the original. This way of working proved instrumental in overcoming limitations of HTR quality. Or any other comments.

Element.name: creatorPositionality
Element.clariah:label: Description of potential positionality impact factors
Element.clariah:explanation: Think of aspects that could have impact on the work in terms of positionality, e.g. particular domain of expertise, gender, age, etc.

Element.name: feedbackSectionFive
Element.clariah:label: Feedback
Element.clariah:explanation: Please use this space to provide any feedback on this section and to share any other insights or information you think would be useful for this level.
